properties.areaDesc: Perry; Jackson; Union; Alexander; Pulaski; Fulton; Hickman; Carlisle; Ballard
properties.headline: Heat Advisory issued July 29 at 2:16AM CDT until July 29 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Paducah KY
properties.description:
* WHAT...Heat index values mainly around 105 degrees expected, but
locally up to around 110 degrees is possible.

* WHERE...In Illinois, Alexander, Jackson, Perry IL, Pulaski, and
Union Counties. In Kentucky, Ballard, Carlisle, Fulton, and
Hickman Counties.

* WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 8 PM CDT this evening.

* IMPACTS...Hot temperatures and high humidity may cause heat
illnesses.
properties.instruction:
Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of
the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors.

NWSheadline: HEAT ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING

title: Current watches, warnings, and advisories for Jackson (ILZ084) IL
